Key Match Events: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 stretch with a go-ahead, two-run double
Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam
Willi Castro had an RBI single to snap an 0-for-16 skid
Pre-Game Insights: Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli said the team had 'good energy, the good at-bats that they gave us. They were really locked in and doing their part in a nice way'
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Wallner said 'I think we feel good. Guys getting hits and just continuous hits, driving guys in, in scoring position, is huge for us'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins remain six games behind Cleveland and 1 1/2 behind Kansas City in the AL Central
Los Angeles has lost four of five
INF Brandon Drury left the game in the fifth inning with left hamstring tightness
OF Bryce Teodosio sustained a small finger fracture on a bunt attempt a night earlier
Others: OF Byron Buxton will be activated from the 10-day injured list prior to Friday's game against Cincinnati
OF Manuel Margot was reinstated from the injured list after missing 10 games with a right groin strain
